title: Ilona - CLOCK WISE EYES Triple Firming Complex
features: A concentrated, triple-intensive eye creme incorporating Milk Proteins, Vitamin A, and Elastin.
Helps rebuild the fragile eye area and soften fine lines and wrinkles.
description: The maintenance program for eyes. Incorporates Whey (milk) Proteins known as peptides and efficacious levels of Vitamin A and Elastin to help rebuild and firm the delicate eye areas. Employs Caffeine to induce microcirculation, and Cucumber Extract to help decongest. Scatters light away from fine lines to immediately soften their appearance. Helps rebuild firmness. Softens fine lines and wrinkles. Hydrates multiple layers. Helps relieve puffiness by stimulating micro-circulation. Soothes and calms with natural plant extracts. Deceptively lightweight creme formula won't drift into eyes. Compatible with contact lens users. Rapidly penetrates to deliver instant and prolonged results.
